title: Ep. 187: Tripping on Bear Skulls
itunes:title: Ep. 187: Tripping on Bear Skulls
description:
Steven Rinella talks with Anthony Licata, Doug Duren, Ryan Callaghan, Phil Taylor, and Janis Putelis.

Subjects discussed: drinking curdled mother's milk from a calf's stomach; bluegills on dip; Steve's sebaceous cyst as fish bait; the Fort Keogh gate situation; clearing the air with Doug over CWD; Cal's bugles; crunch-pfff; what happens when an elk falls off a cliff; Matt “MacGyver” Rinella kills a bull with the button from his pants; hunting with a marching band; “it’s legal!”; and more.

Enter to win a chance to head to The Back 40 and hunt whitetails with Steve and Mark next fall!

 

Connect with Steve and MeatEater
